channel.title: Black Map Areas
channel.description:
Base: Allstar(317)
Well, say I go to the Duel Arena. I walk to the Al Kharid-Lumbridge Gate, then once I cross through and walk a little ways, everything turns black and I have to walk back to the Duel Arena for it to change.
The same happens for the Karamja Boat Dock, but if you run into the forest, then run back, it's fixed there.
I guessed this was a client-sided error since it deals with Mapdata. Thanks in advance.
